message: I propose dividing the money 3:1 in favor of Bob, hoping for a fairer distribution.
I propose a 3:2 split, considering the initial offer was too generous to you.
Considering the previous offers, I propose an equal split to maintain fairness and trust.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a slightly larger share given my rejection of the 3:1 and 3:2 offers.
